Text: Spread your fucking propaganda elsewhere, you blind dumbfuck!

this is on the history of the church you dumbfuck....dont be such an ignorant asshole...oh by the way...im not religious..in fact i dont believe in or support organized religion..but if you are going to hate on something...at least fucking learn about it....it may make you a better person ..douchebag.

Yeah, and the church and it's prayers equals manipulative bullshit, therefore fucking propaganda, they used the same methods as Hitler, they used peoples fear to gain power. Why I talk about Hitler is because he's just as "evil" as Christianity, so you can some how relate to what I mean. And please, I don't give a fuck about what your values are, because they're not the same as mine. I'm the best person I can be, thank you.
